ops.js: { let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][17] = pos.x; Bank[6][19] = pos.y; Bank[6][21] = pos.z; Bank[6][7] = pos.triangleId; }

dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
“I know this isn't the right time
to do this.”

{Barret}
“…I ain't in a cheery mood.
So jus' leave me alone.”

{Barret}
“So PLAY!
…mess around all you want!”{PAUSE}“Don't forget we're after Sephiroth!”

{Tifa}
“He'll be fine.
He seems to be doing
a little better now.”

{Tifa}
“We'd better be careful,
Sephiroth might be around.”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Go together
{CHOICE}Don't go together

{Aeris}
“I wish we could just forget
everything and have fun!”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Go together
{CHOICE}Don't go together

{Red XIII}
“…You want to go with me?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Go together
{CHOICE}Don't go together

{Barret}
“…it's {Cait Sith}.
What's he doin' so quietly?”

{Yuffie}
“Hey, isn't that {Cait Sith}?
What's he doing?”

“Uh…
It's not time for the Event yet…”

“Tonight's Enchantment Night!
All the attractions are free.”{PAUSE}“How 'bout it you two? There's
going to be an entertaining show
in Event Square!”

{Aeris}
“Oh, that was fun.
Hey, let's go on the Gondola.”

{Tifa}
“Hmm, that was funny.
Hey, let's go on the Gondola next.”

{Yuffie}
“I didn't get it. {Cloud},
let's go on the Gondola next.”

{Barret}
“Let's go somewhere
where we can talk, in private.”
